title: Dr. David R. Hawkins - Beyond The Ordinary Interviews (M4B)
description:
Dr. David R. Hawkins - Beyond The Ordinary Interviews

July 12th, 2005
"SerenityÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ 

"Serenity! That upsets me!" as we have a HOOT of a time with Dr H. he explains maintaining serenity is a problem for many, taking one's self too seriously, making life drama.  Love what you do!  To be light hearted you recontexualize the entire field.  The "Ultra Stupid" story and owning your downside.  The brain and spiritual self aligned with essence, "the humorists are really the healers of society ...there's an inner seriousness to humor, penetrating the illusion."  Intelligence is innate to life, "Just look at a tiger's face, the design, a beautiful piece of art!"  ...Oh, and a quote from Brocolli.


June 14th, 2005
"Conviction"

Arising from your understanding not from outside, discovering a greater truth  ah!...now there is growth!  Welcome contradictions, Spiritual Dictum: Judge not, why? Because you don't have the capacity to know all and judge correctly.  Being complete in yourself, every moment is a choice, and endearing stories of his adventures as a little boy, and later being terrified of speaking to a group of more than two!


May 10th, 2005
"Transcending Barriers"

Perceptions and presumptions reflect where your LOC is, attraction and aversion are illusion, let go of ego's payoffs, that is short term gain.  The "Cultural Creatives" and acquiring responsibility towards oneself, stewardship over your own life.


April 19th, 2005
"Alignment"

Most people think of love as romance, passion, involvement  ...rather, it is commonly possessive attraction, need, animal instinct, involving the solar plexus rather than the heart.  Real love calibrates at 500, it is alignment that surpasses baser instincts with purpose, the future or the relationship, concern for the happiness of another first, and spiritual intention.  Specialness, being homesick, and fear of loss.  Everything is transitory ... if you cling to things you will suffer.  The one sentence you need for a long term relationship, and what a cat would say if you asked him what is a cat?!  Current book in the works, "Transcending the Levels of Consciousness".


March 8th, 2005 
"Karma"

Perceptions of Karma from West to East; we have a calibrated LOC at the time of birth (accumulation of past deeds) then we have divine amnesia; This is a place of optimum karmic possibility with infinite options, make maximum use of this opportunity, use your lifetime wisely!  Dr. H's own karmic story of failing the warrior's honor; Nothing happens by accident; Learn to undo negative karma; Create good karma, gain spiritual responsibility.


February 8th, 2005 
"Vision"

Exploring spiritual vision:  We are brought forward from ancient man surviving by acquisition and the perceptions of the animal world; to developing integrity, intellect, rules of logic and reason, and onto developing concern for others, peacefulness, and the illusion of a separate "I", that autonomous mysterious agent. How to acquire rapid spiritual vision? Contemplate everything as a consequence of intention.

January 11th, 2005 
"The Meaning and Purpose of Life"

His total revelation described and the eternal agony,  "...my life is dedicated to find the truth regardless of the cost".   Ignorance is the basis of all suffering, fear is an illusion, the basic truth of creation is freedom, no one is paddling your canoe except you!

December 14th, 2004

What is lost in the translation? when is killing "ok"? spirituality not primarily for healing; what is after death? how to recognize the right course; is string theory true? do angels exist? illness is choice though not a conscious one; The Course; rationale for free will? and, "...when you pass the Black Beetle with his legs flopping in the air, turn him over with a twig."
November 9th, 2004
The most common cause of spiritual confusion, the "final door", reversed meridians, spiritual errors in Christianity (Revelations), the Lamsa bible, hypnotism, narcissism, crop circles, astral vs. celestial realm and healing angels, love and consciousness, wealth takes more than desire, and the path to God is through Walmart!

October 12th, 2004 

Non-linear dynamics, spiritual will and karma, being in the presence of a spiritual teacher, misinterpreting a spiritual teacher, at 14 how to integrate spiritual teachings into ones life, Jesus never existed???, attractor fields, and choice within a determined path.

September 14th, 2004 

A lunatic with integrity? Is there an individual soul? An untimely death? Is dream analysis beneficial? Credit is better than cash? The quickest way to jump 100 points? Can audio or video substitute being in the presence of a Teacher and experiencing their energy? I fear my LOC will drop! There's a choice in every instant...

August 10th, 2004 

Calibrating Broccoli, not the vegetable, the parrot!   Questions answered on oxytocin, depression in males, money, astrology, Bush, getting rid of astral entities, calibration accuracy, "mixed" marriage, pain and sounds in the head, "Fahrenheit 9/11", and utilizing imagination aligned by your intent.

July 13th, 2004 

Each thought arises like fish flying up out of the sea, working in a bureaucracy, what is hell and what is evil, the function of imagination, death, Mohammed's fall, The Course in Miracles, and Mrs. Hawkins says hello!

June 8th, 2004 

His new book, calibration adds to intuition, dreams, ego and super ego, boredom, ADD, "stuck" in the high 500s, and Chinese fortune cookies.



May 11th, 2004 

Advise on attaining consistent calibration, "The Passion of Christ", with children be the best human being you can be, and fun with Eeyore.

April 13th, 2004 

Questions answered; Consciousness, genetics, karma, taking an oath, killing the spider or not.

March 9th, 2004 

The attributes of consciousness, his new book coming soon, focusing, the Holy Spirit, knowing with a small "k", and Kundalini energy.

February 10th, 2004 

Cause & Effect: A dualistic concept that divides one into seemingly two, there's no "either-or-ness" about spirituality, and it's more important to suceed than to win.

January 13th, 2004 

Questions answered; Christ consciousness, can belief systems influence kinesiology, "heavy" music affects on the body, and how low can you go!




Gloria in Excelsis Deo!




~*~*~ Please Seed For As Long As Possible ~*~*~



DR. DAVID R. HAWKINS
Biography Summary

Sir David R. Hawkins, M.D., Ph.D. is a nationally renowned psychiatrist, physician, researcher, and lecturer. He co-authored the ground-breaking work, Orthomolecular Psychiatry with Nobel Laureate Linus Pauling, that helped revolutionize psychiatry. His national television appearances include The MacNeil/Lehrer News Hour, The Barbara Walters Show, and The Today Show. Winner of the Huxley Award, knighted by the Sovereign Order of the Hospitaliers of St. John of Jerusalem, nominated for the Templeton Prize and honored in the East with the title "Tae Ryoung Sun Kak Tosa" (Foremost Teacher of the Way to Enlightenment), Dr. Hawkins' honors are vast. His background is detailed in Who's Who in America and Who's Who in the World, and his work has been acclaimed by many world leaders and Nobelists, including Mother Teresa.

Dr. Hawkins has lectured at the University of Argentina; Notre Dame, Stanford, and Harvard Universities; Westminster Abbey; and the Oxford Forum. In addition, he has been an advisor to Catholic, Protestant, and Buddhist monasteries. He has conferred with foreign governments on international diplomacy and has been instrumental in resolving long-standing conflicts that were major threats to world peace. He is the author of the best-selling trilogy, Power vs. Force (published in 17 languages), The Eye of the I, and I: Reality and Subjectivity, and four additional books, including Truth vs. Falsehood, Transcending the Levels of Consciousness, Discovery of the Presence of God and Spirituality and Modern Man.



~*~*~ Please Seed For As Long As Possible ~*~*~
